snippet: GENATT--Les. Our best friend for the last 45 years left after considerable suffering. Our families grew side by side and we extend our sympathies to his entire loving family. He was so sweet, decent and my pal. We all will have an empty feeling for a long time. Mort & Lois Seaman and Family 1/3
lead_paragraph: GENATT--Les. Our best friend for the last 45 years left after considerable suffering. Our families grew side by side and we extend our sympathies to his entire loving family. He was so sweet, decent and my pal. We all will have an empty feeling for a long time. Mort & Lois Seaman and Family 1/3
